summary:
Adds chapels to the Skyrim world and a quest on the destruction of a chapel devoted to talos. 

Features: Chapels to stumble upon in your travels! 
Custom Music to play in the Chapels. Adds a completely new section to music and does not replace any tracks. 
Adds a quest. 
A right to sanctuary for outlaws. 

I missed the likes of weynon prior
descriptionHtml:
Adds chapels to the Skyrim world and a quest on the destruction of a chapel devoted to talos. 

Features: Chapels to stumble upon in your travels! 
Custom Music to play in the Chapels. Adds a completely new section to music and does not replace any tracks. 
Adds a quest. 
A right to sanctuary for outlaws. 

I missed the likes of weynon priory among other chapels and churches in oblivion and felt there were no friendly areas in the wild of Skyrim, I am also making some of them allow a right to sanctuary for outlaws: Guards won\'t be able to arrest you while you are in the chapel (much like medieval England). 

Locations: 

Chapel of Zenithar - Shor\'s Stone 
Chapel of Talos (Kynesgrove Priory) - Kynesgrove 
Cathedral of Stendarr (Lindisfarne Priory & Winery) - North East Falkreath


I will be adding more content to the mod today including: people on pilgrimages, story behind Chapel of Talos being destroyed, among more. 

Next in line: Chapel of Kynareth

Available on Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=120751409

You can check out my other mods if you like: 
Cozy Riverwood Home - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=115008545 [Adds a lovely, warm home to Riverwood, aimed at, but not limited to, starter characters, check it out :)

Enjoy 

Leave a comment, I\'m happy to answer questions or if you have any problems. :)
author: GwaeBloom
